      • earlyAbandonedDistance

        public static java.lang.Double earlyAbandonedDistance(double[] series1,
                                                      double[] series2,
                                                      double cutoff)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Implements Euclidean distance with early abandoning.
        Parameters:
        series1 - the first series.
        series2 - the second series.
        cutoff - the cut-off threshold
        Returns:
        the distance if it is less than cutoff or Double.NAN if it is above.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error occurs.
